title: Procurement Clause Pack
summary: Contract-ready clauses and evidence anchors for vendor onboarding and renewals.
scope: Procurement, legal, and vendor managers binding STD-01 and STD-02 to contracts.

includedArtifacts.title: Clause library
includedArtifacts.detail: Prewritten clauses aligned to STD-01.1.1 and STD-02.2.1 for MSAs, DPAs, and RFPs.

includedArtifacts.title: Evidence pack crosswalk
includedArtifacts.detail: Mapping table that ties each clause to tiered evidence bundles and audit prompts.

includedArtifacts.title: Negotiation checklist
includedArtifacts.detail: Redlines, fallback positions, and approval gates for procurement and legal teams.

includedArtifacts.title: Vendor briefing memo
includedArtifacts.detail: One-page explainer that orients suppliers to receipts, clocks, and remedies.

useCases: Include enforceable rights language in new vendor contracts.
Align renewal negotiations with updated standards and evidence packs.
Hand off procurement requirements to delivery teams with a shared checklist.
Document compliance expectations for audits or regulator inquiries.
updateCadence: Quarterly, or within two weeks of standards updates.

exports.description: Clone the bundle as Markdown templates with versioned change logs.
Duplicate the clause pack into a Notion workspace with linked review tasks.
Download a print-ready packet for contract reviews and executive sign-off.
